CustomField.formula: CASE( MOD(Case__r.Contract_Expiration_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, (Case__r.Contract_Expiration_Date__c) - 90 + FLOOR((-90-1)/5)*2, 1, (Case__r.Contract_Expiration_Date__c) - 90 + FLOOR((-90)/5)*2, 2, (Case__r.Contract_Expiration_Date__c) - 90 + FLOOR((-90+1)/5)*2, 3, (Case__r.Contract_Expiration_Date__c) - 90 + FLOOR((-90+2)/5)*2, 4, (Case__r.Contract_Expiration_Date__c) - 90 + FLOOR((-90+3)/5)*2, 5, (Case__r.Contract_Expiration_Date__c) - 90 + CEILING((-90)/5)*2, 6, (Case__r.Contract_Expiration_Date__c) - IF(-90>0,1,0) - 90 + CEILING((-90)/5)*2, null)
CustomField.label: Follow up Date-CR
